name: Hero Runner Website
des1: Hero Runner is a MERN stack project. This Project build with React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Express.js, Firebase, Material UI
des2: This website is secured with JWT token.
des3: Initially user can see the home page and also see the all products. If user want to buy any product, at first they have to register in the website.
des4: If they was registered, they have to login, if they was logout. Then they buy any product and they can see there Dashboard.
des5: If user is an admin, he/she can make admin anyone who already registered in the website.
des6: Admin can manage the all orders, can add a product in the website, also admin can delete any product from the website.

name: Hero Traveler
des1: Hero Traveler is also a MERN stack project. This Project was built with React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Express.js, Firebase, React Bootstrap.
des2: User can choose there offer for travel in many interesting tourist place.
des3: User can book there offer and also update there status, such as pending or approved.
des4: Admin can add new offer in the website, also he/she can delete a booking.
des5: At first users must have login for booking any offer. On the other hand, user can not book any offer.
des6: If user wants to delete any book, they can delete it.

name: Doctors Hospital
des1: A well environmental hospital is important for us. Doctors Hospital one of them. Patients will feel comfort with staying this hospital. We always try to best for patients.
des2: People can see the details about Doctors Hospital.
des3: If any user want to see whole details, there requred to sign-in or sign-up.
des4: Patients found update in the site.
des5: Is Doctors avaible or not? it will get find into the site.
des6: Accessibility will be always open, if users has valid data.

name: Ministry Unity
des1: Ministry Unity is a project which is unite the all president or government for a specific goal. How much budget for there project/goal, this budget will contribute by the all president or government who present in this unity.
des2: This Project will create a world class ministry unity.
des3: User can add the person and budget in cart.
des4: Can create a unity and can be choice which persons budget will satisfy.
